article_title: All clear on northbound Kolb near 22nd
article_text:
The remains of an earlier garbage fire had been restricting travel on northbound Kolb near 22nd Street, but the area is now clear and traffic is back to normal.

Earlier this morning

#HEADSUP: We have a garbage fire at 22nd/Kolb on the east side. Take Broadway/Wilmot as the alternates there. pic.twitter.com/2ILTzGLCEk — Sasha Loftis (@SashaLoftis) November 27, 2015

Drivers were advised to avoid the area.

Copyright 2015 Tucson News Now. All rights reserved.

article_metadata.Description: No more burnt trash in the road this morning, all clear for travel.
article_metadata.author: Tucson News Now Staff
